sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { saveShippingAddress } from '../actions/cartAction' const ShippingScreen = ({ history }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(shippingAddress.postalCode) const [province, setProvince] = useState(shippingAddress.province) //提交收货地址函数 const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAddress({ address, city, postalCode, province })) history.push('/payment') } return (

收货地址

详细地址： setAddress(e.target.value)} > 所在地区： setCity(e.target.value)} > 邮政编码： setPostalCode(e.target.value)} > 所在省份： setProvince(e.target.value)} >
) } export default ShippingScreen
